history.proof: induction n. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite <- IHn. scongruence use: minus_n_O, Nat.add_0_r unfold: sum_f, Init.Nat.sub, sum_f_R0.

exceptions.exn: In environment u : nat -> R n : nat IHn : sum_f 0 n u = sum_f_R0 u n Unable to unify "sum_f 0 n u + u (S n)" with "sum_f 0 (S n) u".

original: induction n. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite <- IHn. reflexivity.
